title: Looking for Timmy
description: My little brother, Billy, and I hadn't a notion that our misbehavior would trigger a terrifying nightmare for the folks in the small rural area where our grandparents lived ... it was a wide place in the road that some said was a stone's throw to nowhere ... the residents were haunted by the young boy who went missing from the area in 1945, and ten years later, we were a big part of the reason they were once again looking for Timmy ...
author: Peggy Randall-Martin
